ctx: intros p n d pl H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop" on hypothesis of type "pl_path_incl pl p".

ctx: intros p n d pl H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 3 branches.

original: intros p n d pl H1 H2 H3. apply pl_path_rec_equiv_0_def in H3. destruct H3 as [plp [H3 H4]]. exists (iteres pl_path plp n). apply H4.
